committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to designate the week following Christmas each year as "Blood Donor Week".

summary.text: Designates the period of December 26 through December 31 of each year as "Blood Donor Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the week following Christmas each year as "Blood Donor Week".
